My AIJA Join AIJA

Welcome to AIJA, the International Association of Young Lawyers

AIJA is the only global association devoted to lawyers and in-house counsel aged 45 and under. Since 1962 AIJA provides outstanding international opportunities for young lawyers to network, learn and develop.

Join AIJA About AIJA

commissions in various legal fields

SpotlightAIJA Podcast

The podcast offers practical tips to help young lawyers and more seasoned professionals improve their business and professional lives. In each season we talk to lawyers and other sector experts with valuable insights into the legal profession.

BEST INTERNATIONAL

Future Lawyer Award 2022

Reuniting & Embracing the Change

We are thrilled to invite law students and recent law graduates to participate
in AIJA’s 2022 Best International Future Lawyer Award competition!

Please send your submission to AIJA through the Google Forms by 15 May 2022 before midnight CET.

If you have any questions, please contact us at myprivacy@aija.org.
